name: Guider of Souls
description:
== GDTV Game Jam Submission == 

Souls are trapped on an unknown part of the world and it is your mission to free them from the depths of the living. You were given the location of 3 neglected souls in a cave that need to be set free! Travel through the cave and set the helpless souls free. They might even help you to find the others!

== Controls ==

Movement - Arrow Keys

X - Interact

E - Use skill

R - Switch skill

== Tools Used ==

Game engine : Godot

Art : Krita

Music : Band Lab

== Credits ==

tlee32 : Programmer, Designer

markcmlee : Programmer, Character Designer

jaimclee : Musician, SFX artist

mikelee53 : Programmer, artist

== Fun Stuff to Know ==

  • three additional "souls" were planned but didn't get to:
    • A witch named : Which Witch
    • A spring named :  Springy
    • A macho guy named : Deadlift
  • we were originally going to go for a clean vector art look but wanted to try out a more painted look,  didn't really go too well but it works!
    • Painting is hard!
    • Sorry in advance! 

== Word from us==

This is definitely a proof-of-concept type build of a game that we had originally planned for but we are proud of what came of it in the end! Would appreciate any feedback and thanks for visiting the page!
